channel.title: cmwen.github.io Podcast
channel.description: Automatically generated podcasts from blog posts covering software development, AI, and tech productivity.
channel.itunes:author: Min Wen
channel.itunes:summary: Automatically generated podcasts from blog posts covering software development, AI, and tech productivity.

item.title: I'm an ISTJ-A: The Reliable Rock (But Maybe a Little Set in My Ways)
item.description: Ever get called the dependable one? There's a chance you might be an ISTJ-A, just like me! Let's explore what this Myers-Briggs type means and what it's like to live in this organized, logical mind.
item.itunes:author: Min Wen
item.itunes:summary: Ever get called the dependable one? There's a chance you might be an ISTJ-A, just like me! Let's explore what this Myers-Briggs type means and what it's like to live in this organized, logical mind.

item.title: Understanding LLM Tool Calling in LangChain
item.description: A step-by-step guide to how LLM Tool Calling works in LangChain, complete with a sequence diagram.
item.itunes:author: Min Wen
item.itunes:summary: A step-by-step guide to how LLM Tool Calling works in LangChain, complete with a sequence diagram.

item.title: Unlocking the Power of VS Code Copilot: Using #fetch for RAG
item.description: Learn how to leverage VS Code Copilot's #fetch tool to use Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) without coding. Enhance productivity with custom prompts.
item.itunes:author: Min Wen
item.itunes:summary: Learn how to leverage VS Code Copilot's #fetch tool to use Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) without coding. Enhance productivity with custom prompts.

item.title: From Code to Camera: My Journey into Video Production
item.description: A software developer's first venture into video recording and editing, sharing lessons learned from creating technical demos and discovering the parallels between coding and video production.
item.itunes:author: Min Wen
item.itunes:summary: A software developer's first venture into video recording and editing, sharing lessons learned from creating technical demos and discovering the parallels between coding and video production.
